frame.name: Notification_of_charges
frame.definition:
<def-root>The judge or other court officer (the Authority) informs the <fen>Accused</fen> of the <fen>Charges</fen> against him/her, i.e. the alleged actions and the relevant laws. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Accused">The board</fex> has been <t>accused</t> <fex name="Arraign_authority">by the federal court</fex> <fex name="Charges">of making decisions based on narrow agendas and meddling where it shouldn't</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Arraign_authority">The police</fex> <t>charged</t> <fex name="Accused">a young nurse</fex> <fex name="Charges">with four murders</fex>.</ex> Compare to: Citing. </def-root>

FE.name: Arraign_authority
FE.definition: <def-root>The judge or other authority of the court in which the accused person is arraigned.</def-root>

FE.name: Accused
FE.definition: <def-root>The person being charged with an offense against the law.</def-root>

FE.name: Charges
FE.definition: <def-root>The crime with which the Accused is charged</def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>The larger event which contains the Notification of Charges event. <ex>Seven people have been <t>indicted</t> <fex name="CE">in the seven-year investigation</fex>.</ex></def-root>
